## Business Context

### Problem Statement

The current diagram reflects the earlier incremental mode state and does not match the updated v2 subagent availability and workflow stages.

### User Impact

Users get an accurate, current visual of Vibe Flow v2 orchestration and subagents, improving onboarding and expectations.

### Success Criteria

- [ ] README Mermaid diagram accurately reflects current v2 orchestrator + subagents
- [ ] Diagram aligns with incremental mode and installed subagents
- [ ] Documentation stays consistent with actual agent availability

---

## Technical Scope

### What's In Scope

- Update Mermaid diagram in README
- Ensure diagram matches current agent roster and phases

### What's Out of Scope

- Changing agent logic
- Adding new subagents

### Dependencies

- Current v2 agent roster and workflow conventions

## High-Level Approach

Review current README diagram and update it to show the v2 orchestration flow and subagents.
